product_name: CMC Press The Colorado Trail Databook - 5th Edition
long_description: Designed for the thruhiker, backpacker, day hiker, mountain biker or horse rider,. Author: Colorado Trail Foundation. Softcover; 87 pages; color photographs and maps. Colorado Mountain Club Press; copyright 2013. Includes suggestions for resupply points and local amenities, as well as notes about the surrounding Fourteeners (14,000 ft. peaks) and wilderness areas. Part of the Colorado Mountain Club Pack Guide series,. Includes the new 80 mi. Collegiate West section of trail, as well as bicycle detours around each area.
short_description: Designed for the thruhiker, backpacker, day hiker, mountain biker or horse rider, The Colorado Trail Databook includes features, mile points, elevations and maps of each segment of the trail.
